title: Luxury House For Sale In Nawala
details:
Great investment
Great Architecture,Great spacious spaces allocated for main areas.
Security system,
Great landscaping,with surrounding ponds and manicured garden space,which provides cooling.
The water pond beneath dining area is a rare attraction.
Each specific area of the house has a designated speciality with soothing colour and wall hangings.
All rooms are Spacious,
Master room with en-suit room,with spacious luxury bath and walk-in closet.
A/c rooms.

Access to Colombo in few minutes, Many private and government schools, banks, main diners,hospitals and more,
